extendedInfo.description: SPC features:1. Blacklist that block sms and block calls as firewall2. Private Conversation that move sms call to a private place3. Customizable filters for more block or private requestTag:SPC,call block,caller ignore,reject calls, block number

reviews.title: Would like to see some update
reviews.comment: Better if the password entry option is at the middle rather than at top.... would like to enter only numbers as password. Don\'t expect to click k to enter. Enter in to the apps  as soon as we enter password.. during SMS notification when I type the password it should directly go to the respective receipients chat windows
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Blocks very well. But texts the auto response before even receiving a block txt. Kind of embarassing sending a txt when the blocker didnt even txt yet. Tested it on friends first.
reviews.author: Sara Lopez

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Thanks for such an application. I am happy about this apps. But i like to give some feature requirement/  If you able to provide custom mode to set time for unknown call blocking ,should able to go automatically mode shift ,Just like Profile.  This will help lot to set time for personnel call , private call and business call as per time slot  Thanks Best Regards Jayaraja R
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App..but
reviews.comment: I think the app its great but do an update please , i can receive picture message. From a blocked person!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but need some fixes....
reviews.comment: Good app... Actually awsm one..  But sms goes in parts if longer one.... Please fix that ASAP...  Then I will give u the full stars....
reviews.author: Rachit Verma

reviews.title: Case sensitive?
reviews.comment: Key word filter for SMS block doesn\'t allow CASE though it\'s clearly notified as \"case sensitive\". Moreover, pls allow white list filter and more details of block log, what if I want to add that new number to my contact?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: A must have for your phone. Just don\'t let your battery get too low, on my phone (Amaze) the text is seen. Be careful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my Bionic
reviews.comment: Worked fine on original Droid but doesn\'t work on Bionic.  Emailed dev about transferring paid license and never got answer. No way i\'m paying again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Blocks calls AND texts. Best one yet. Also has it so if someone tries to make you log in to the app cause they\'re suspicious, you can set a fake pw that takes you to a to do list. GREAT app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working well...
reviews.comment: This is a great app. But nowadays it is not working well. It is not filter my private messages and when i try to do that it forced close. It\'s also not backup my private messages. Plz fix it.
reviews.author: Ajay Pratap Singh

reviews.title: Several pro
reviews.comment: We cannot restore those sms & call log which we put on private contact Every thing is rubish Ful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ics
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always catch SMS in time on galaxy nexus running ics. Worked fine on galaxy s ii. You guys would make more money if you lowered the price and put on android market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spc service no good fraud
reviews.comment: Once u  reset your mobile u will lose your spc app will not b restored not reliable avoid purchasing it just use free version if u want
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: You have to make the app disappear from the recent apps list and hide the application icon and encrypted all the info, then its worth 5 stars or more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Everything that I wanted from a msging app. Works for me. Don\'t have to worry anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not ice cream sandwich compatible!
reviews.comment: This app worked perfect until I installed ice cream sandwich.  Now it won\'t block or hide anything.  They need to fix this ASAP. Epic Touch (Galaxy 2) on Sprint.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: I had installed this app. it was working well.. Fig. I\'d look around at the other call blockers n ended up reinstalling this one n I got a unknown # n it blocked it!! Unlike the other apps that didn\'t do nothing!! It would b a lot better if u would make the 1 that cost $ FREE!! Plz think about it.. Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best (galaxy s 2)
reviews.comment: After installing and uninstalling 5 or 6 call blockers i found what i needed. It has password protection, notification which can be customized, no rington  and vibration at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reject call problem
reviews.comment: Reject call log remain in phone (galaxy s2) plz fix it..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: will get you in trouble
reviews.comment: I received a text from a company and replied without noticing that it had no reply to number.   I later found out it had sent the SMS to a blocked number in my SPC causing me considerable embarrassment .It had been doing this to any text sent by a company not in my contacts list
reviews.author: Gary suttle-burton
